title: Is Tom Pidcock Leaving Ineos Grenadiers to Join Second-Tier Team Q36.5!?
content:
Teams refuse to comment on bombshell rumors over Brit superstar's future, but links with Pinarello and reports of rifts at Ineos could make it a possibility.

Read the full article at Is Tom Pidcock Leaving Ineos Grenadiers to Join Second-Tier Team Q36.5!? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
